name: eyeDASH
description:
eyeDASH is an action, bullet hell-ish dungeon crawler in which you help Little Eye rescue his buddies from the mysterious Sharps' Lair. Dash your way through the caverns, rediscover the forgotten Superdash technique and take your revenge on the Sharps.

Your reflexes will be tested by a fast scaling difficulty - ranging from exploration to full-on bullet hell - and 16 hand-crafted levels with various challenges.
Managed to help Little Eye complete his quest? Then take on the final challenge to prove your mastery - beat the game without any help from your buddies!
